org.spongepowered.api.stats.achievement

Interface AchievementBuilder


  • public interface AchievementBuilder
    Represents a builder interface to create new and custom instances of Achievements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Achievement buildAndRegister()
      Builds and registers an instance of an Achievement.
      AchievementBuilder description(Translation description)
      Sets the description that describes this Achievement.
      AchievementBuilder name(String name)
      Sets the internal name for the Achievement.
      AchievementBuilder parent(Achievement parent)
      Sets the parent of this Achievement, if there is one.
      AchievementBuilder sourceStatistic(Statistic stat)
      Sets a statistic which will be used for tracking this achievement.
      AchievementBuilder targetValue(long value)
      Sets the target value of the statistic backing this achievement.
      AchievementBuilder translation(Translation translation)
      Sets the translation for the Achievement.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        AchievementBuilder name(String name)
        Sets the internal name for the Achievement.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of this achievement
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • translation

        AchievementBuilder translation(Translation translation)
        Sets the translation for the Achievement.
        Parameters:
        translation - The translation for the achievement
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

        AchievementBuilder description(Translation description)
        Sets the description that describes this Achievement.
        Parameters:
        description - The description of this achievement

        This builder, for chaining

      • parent

        AchievementBuilder parent(@Nullable
                          Achievement parent)
        Sets the parent of this Achievement, if there is one.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent of this achievement
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • sourceStatistic

        AchievementBuilder sourceStatistic(@Nullable
                                   Statistic stat)
        Sets a statistic which will be used for tracking this achievement. May be null if this achievement is not backed by a statistic but is manually awarded instead. If the statistic is not null then the targetValue(long) must be set as well. This defaults to null if not set.
        Parameters:
        stat - The statistic, or null if not backed by a statistic
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • targetValue

        AchievementBuilder targetValue(long value)
        Sets the target value of the statistic backing this achievement. If the source statistic is not set then this value will be ignored if set. Defaults to 1 if not set.
        Parameters:
        value - The target value
        Returns:
        This builder, for chaining

      • buildAndRegister

        Achievement buildAndRegister()
                      throws IllegalStateException
        Builds and registers an instance of an Achievement.
        Returns:
        A new instance of a achievement
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the achievement is not completed
